name: 葛瑞斐
objective: Through class discussion and group presentations, this course will help develop students’ English conversation skills.  In the course of practicing such skills, we will take as our general topic the issue of aesthetics (the study of ideas about beauty and about art).   Our topics will include:  definitions of beauty; favorite artists; song lyrics; storytelling and personal creativity; self-discovery.
